DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to determine whether the amount of radiation given to the normal areas around the anal cancer can be reduced by using Proton Therapy while reducing the side effects that are seen with standard therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Proton Therapy in Reducing Toxicity in Anal Cancer
